Price: NZ $80

Hi, I'm Michelle

I live in Wellington, New Zealand. I have been making things for many years, but in the last three years I have become addicted to paper craft and book binding. I am self-taught and love to make up new ways to create. I make a lot of books on my journey and I am sharing them here as I run out of storage space!

Intro blurb/description to the vintage journal

The curiosities vintage style Journal is made from an assortment of different weights of tea dye plain papers. It includes pockets and tags for capturing a special occasion or memory. A lovely place to keep your treasured memories, photos, notes and stories, or anything else you can think of! It features hand sewing for the binding. and comes wrapped in hand dyed seam binding.
